conbody.p: The master solicitation is provided to potential sources who are requested to retain it for continued and repetitive use. Individual solicitations must reference the date of the current master solicitation and identify any changes. The contracting officer must-

li.p:
(a)
Make available copies of the master solicitation on request; and

(b)
Provide the cognizant contract administration activity a current copy of the master solicitation.
